dmca.title: DMCA notice
dmca.body:
From: Courtney Rottman [mailto:courtney.rottman@Funimation.com] On Behalf Of
Legal2
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2006 4:24 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA notice



ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 

Attn:  George Poletes, Corporate Counsel

1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

(214) 782-7800 phone

(214) 782-7756 fax

copyright@theplanet.com

 

DMCA Registered Agent

 

RE:  Copyright and Trademark Infringement

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

I would like to report violations of your company's Terms of Service
relating to trademark and copyright infringement.  In accordance with your
guidelines regarding these issues, and in compliance with relevant federal
copyright law, I submit the following:

 

I hereby certify, under penalty of perjury, that the following information
is accurate to the best of my knowledge and belief.

 

I am an employee in the legal department of FUNimation Entertainment.  I am
authorized to act on behalf of FUNimation Entertainment with respect to the
matters discussed herein.

 

FUNimation is a company engaged in the production of animated motion
pictures.  We own or control various exclusive copyrights and trademarks
related to the animated motion pictures known as "Basilisk," "Trinity
Blood," "Speedgrapher," "Tsubasa," and "FullMetal Alchemist" (collectively
referred to as the "Properties").  FUNimation holds exclusive rights to the
Properties throughout the U.S., Canada, Australia, New Zealand, and other
territories.  Specifically, FUNimation is the exclusive licensee for
production and distribution of home videos, DVDs, video CDs, and other home
video formats and devices (hereafter referred to collectively as
"Videograms") within the referenced territories.

 

Our investigations reveal that a site for which your company provides
services is currently being used to sell and/or distribute unlicensed
downloads containing episodes, movies, or other embodiments of the
Properties.  The use of the Properties in this manner is NOT authorized by
FUNimation Entertainment and is a violation of FUNimation's intellectual
property rights.  The specific site found to be in violation is
HentaiCastle.net.  Infringing materials can be found at the following links:

 

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/Basilisk.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/FAConqueror%20of%20Shambala.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/Tsubasa_ChronicleV.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/Tsubasa_ChronicleB.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/Tsubasa_Chronicle.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/Speed_GrapherV.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/Speed_Grapher.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/Speed_GrapherB.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/BasiliskB.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/BasiliskV.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/Trinity_Blood.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/Trinity_BloodB.htm

http://www.hentaicastle.net/anime/Trinity_BloodV.htm

 

You will find the listed web site sells, distributes, promotes, and/or
advertises unauthorized episodes and movies available for download
containing the Properties.  Such unauthorized reproduction of copyrighted
material, coupled with the offer of such reproductions for sale and profit,
is a violation of federal law, and carries stiff penalties, both civil and
criminal.  For the foregoing reasons, FUNimation Entertainment hereby
requests that you expeditiously cause all such infringing material to be
removed or the access thereto disabled.  We further request that the names,
email addresses, physical addresses, and any other contact information
regarding the parties responsible be forwarded to us for the purpose of
pursuing further legal action against them.

 

If you should require any further information please do not hesitate to
contact me by email at Legal2@funimation.com.  The physical and mailing
address of FUNimation Productions is 6851 NE Loop 820, Suite 400, Fort
Worth, TX, 76180.  Please contact me immediately if this notification is not
in substantial compliance with the DMCA, or if some other problem arises
with respect to our request.  I would also request notification when the
above-mentioned site is disabled. 

 

Sincerely,

 

/s/Courtney A. Rottman

Intellectual Property Enforcement

Legal Department

FUNimation Entertainment

6851 N.E. Loop 820, Suite 400

Fort Worth, TX  76180

(817) 788-0627 x 285 

(817) 788-0628 Fax
